scripts.db:setup: cd scripts && npm install && node setup-firebase.js
scripts.db:seed: cd scripts && npm install && node seed-database.js
scripts.db:seed-with-images: cd scripts && npm install && node seed-with-images.js
scripts.db:test: cd scripts && npm install && node test-firebase.js
scripts.db:seed-fixed: cd scripts && npm install && node seed-fixed.js
scripts.db:cleanup-and-seed: cd scripts && npm install && node cleanup-and-seed.js
scripts.db:seed-browser-setup: cd scripts && npm install && node seed-browser-setup.js
scripts.db:seed-browser: echo 'First run: npm run db:seed-browser-setup' && echo 'Then visit: http://localhost:5173/seed-database' && npm run dev
scripts.db:clear: cd scripts && npm install && node clear-database.js
scripts.db:deploy: npm run db:deploy-rules && npm run db:deploy-indexes
